title: The Energetic Endeavors of Sue Allen
summary: Sue Allen discovers her powers of sonic control while busily engaging with her passions for music and coaching, leading her to confront and thwart a villain's plan.
summaryGerman: Sue Allen entdeckt ihre Kräfte der Schallkontrolle, während sie ihren Leidenschaften für Musik und Coaching nachgeht, was dazu führt, dass sie den Plan eines Schurken konfrontiert und vereitelt.
summaryDutch: Sue Allen ontdekt haar krachten van geluidsbeheersing terwijl ze zich bezighoudt met haar passies voor muziek en coaching, waardoor ze het plan van een schurk confronteert en verijdelt.
summaryFrench: Sue Allen découvre ses pouvoirs de contrôle sonique tout en s'engageant activement dans ses passions pour la musique et le coaching, ce qui la conduit à confronter et déjouer le plan d'un méchant.

story.text: Sue Allen begins her week by arranging a new piece for her community choir, finding joy in crafting harmonies.
While coaching her local soccer team, Sue feels a strange vibration in her ears when shouting instructions, causing the soccer ball to freeze mid-air momentarily.
Experimenting at home, Sue discovers she can manipulate sound waves. She spends the evening practicing her newfound abilities.
Realizing the potential of her powers, Sue decides to keep them a secret until she can control them fully.
A local bank alarm goes off, and Sue instinctively uses her power to silence the alarm remotely, preventing a panic.
Sue encounters the villain causing the disturbances at the bank. Using her powers, she creates a symphony of sounds to disorient him and alerts the authorities.
News spreads of a mysterious hero. Sue smiles, reveling in her secret identity and considering the future adventures to come.

ending: As the sun set, Sue Allen considered the harmony not just in her music but in her new dual life, filled with potential melodies and heroic crescendos.
moral: Embrace your unique talents; they might just be your superpowers.
